app.title: Video Maker
app.description:
Video.Guru - AI video maker and video editor from photo & music, easy to share memories and fun moments with your friends. The most user friendly editing app for Android. This all-in-one video editor with powerful & free video editing features: video trim, cut, fast & slow motion, edit video and photos with music, transition effects, filters, save high quality video etc.

Easy-to-use video maker, no watermark! With Video Guru, you can export 4k video without watermark, easily share to YouTube and other social media like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok etc.

üí°All-in-one Video Editor
‚û§ Multi-Layer editing, add music, voice-overs, sound effects, glitch effects, stickers & fun fonts.
‚û§ Easy to use video maker, video editing more fun with transition effects.
‚û§ Best video trimmer & video cutter to trim and cut video. Split video into multi clips.
‚û§ 50+ video transition effects to enhance your videos.
‚û§ Extract audio/music from any videos, add marks to the track according to music rhythm.
‚û§ Edit/combine videos with various filters, pro video editor with music and effects.
‚û§ Free Video Editor and Recorder, NO banner ads & watermark.
‚û§ Convert photos to video with music and effects, edit video like pro.
‚û§ Easily share videos to YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Likee, TikTok etc.

üé¨Pro video maker for All-Platform
* Best vlog maker and intro maker, tons of filters and effects forvideo editing ‚úèÔ∏è.
* Change video speed, create fast/slow motion videoüê¢, and save video in HD quality.
* Whether you are a beginner or pro, Video Guru is the best choice for movie & vlog editing .

üé¨Video editor with music and effects
* Dozens of HD FREE musicüéµ can perfectly meet your needs.
* Various BGM, you can also add custom songs on your device.
* Adjust music volume, fade in/out options supported.
* Easy-to-use music video maker for All-Platform.

üé¨Video Filter & Effects
* Add stunning movie style video filters and FX effects to video panorama.
* Merge clips into one with transitions effects.
* Just a few clicks, you can create an eye-catching video‚ú® with magic video effects and stylish filters.

üé¨Video Transitions
* Edit videos with transitions and music, combine videos for YouTube.
* A variety of video transition effects for editing, such as Glitch, VHS, Noise...

üé¨Video Speed Editing
* Free video editing app & PRO video editor with music, fast/slow motion.
* Speed up or slow down video, adjust video speed from 0.2x to 100x.

üé¨Video Background
* Add multi ratio borders and no crop. Background color and video blur editor.
* Blur background to fit for social media.

üé¨Video Compressor & Converter
*  Custom resolution to compress and convert your video. Video creator with many quality options.
*  HD video maker and video trimmer app‚úÇÔ∏è, advanced vlog maker and intro maker for beginners.
*  Enhance the video quality, support up to 4K.

üé¨Video Cropper & Ratio
* Crop video in any ratios, such as 1:1, 16:9, 3:2, etc. HD export, no quality loss.
* Cinema: standard 16:9 for YouTube video editing‚úèÔ∏è. No watermark.
* Square: 1:1 for Instagram. Pro movie maker & video maker for YouTube, Instagram.

Video Guru is the best video editor and vlog editor, and it includes the most powerful editing tools as shown above. Try Video Guru now üöÄ and enjoy your video editing here! FREE and no registration required! In addition we constantly update effects, filters, transitions and fonts etc.

If you have any concerns or suggestions about Video Guru, don't hesitate to contact us at feedback@videoguru.app (or by clicking "Send Feedback" in the app settings page). üòä

Disclaimer:
Video.Guru is not affiliated, associated, sponsored, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook.

app.summary: Pro video editor app for Instagram, edit video with song, AI, effect & slowmo.

reviews.text: I have the free version. It has great transitions, cool sound effects, fun fonts, etc. It makes your average video editing more fun. The thing I like THE MOST is the ability to edit down to the exact moment with ease. I bet the paid version is great, but I'm happy with this one for now. 5 Stars!!

I forgot to update this but I DID get the restore option back after getting a new device. The only issue now is, what happened to the video section that allowed us to customize the videos for YouTube, TikTok and etc? I thought it was an issue with the device again but it wasn't. The option is not there anymore. I really like this app so I hope they put the option back again when they can. I'm still going to use it though because like I said before I really like this app.
reviews.replyText: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please make sure you're logged in with the correct account that has the subscription, then go to our settings page and click "Restore Purchase." If the issue persists, kindly provide more details, and we'll do our best to assist you promptly. Thank you for your understanding. üôè‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.text: Tried multiple apps, including this one & commented, "A BASIC". But WITHIN NO TIME, the developers began to pace themselves to keep updating, upgrading, & earning my trust & reliance. MOST IMPORTANT DECLARATION: This is the very first video editing app I've ever paid to SUBSCRIBED. Though, I consider myself a beginner, trying to learn video editing skills. Overall, if it is not the best, it is surely in a race to be ONE OF THE BEST. I'm glad to have found this and to be a lifetime subscriber.

Great app! No complaints, but a few suggestions... The transitions are smooth, the app doesn't lag even when I'm only using mobile data, and there are plenty of features you can use for free! Most good editing apps require payment for anything good, and I'm glad that this one doesn't! I would like to be able to have clips shorter than a second, though. And being able to speed a clip up more than x2. Other than that, it's great! 10/10 reccomend to anyone in need of a good editing app.

Haven't Switched Yet! I've been using this app for over 2 years now and love it. I use it for quick mini edits and enjoy it so much I even paid for the pro. Don't regret it yet! If you need something quick and easy that makes quality videos on your phone, this is a great app! (Droid/Galaxy User) Keep up the good work dev team.

Video Maker is so far turning out to be pretty fun and easy to use. I have not delved much in the app yet but I have seen some features that I have never seen before like the voice changer and recorder. I have noticed right away the nice filters as well. The music is has available are somewhat like the others that come with similar apps but the recorder/voice changer features should certainly be interesting to play with. Good job üôÇ

Super easy and RELIABLE for quick and simple videos. I don't use most the features, but totally worth the price for half what it does without irritating and interrupting me in the process. If you already understand the basics of video editing, and want a "fighter escort" to your desktop editor (I use DaVinci Resolve) you can't go wrong for the price. Export is excellent and so far hasn't failed me once with speed and quality no matter what setting I choose.

Love my experience so far. It didn't crash at all and it stayed saved when my tablet died. There are two things I found annoying though. There is no "undo" button. Sometimes you delete part of a clip and then you don't even remember where that part was when you realized you actually need it or that you deleted the wrong thing. And there is no color background for text. I wanted to do subtitles with a colored bar but I couldn't. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Great app, especially all the features it has for free without upgrading to premium. But then when you upgrade it, they blow the original settings out the water. It's a great app. And it doesn't glitch, and I don't lag, and it don't drown you in ads. Which is a plus !!! And it's pretty self explanatory for all beginners and don't really know how to maneuver in a editing app. It's a great app. !!

I love this app! I needed an app that I could pick up quickly and edit some video game clips for my social media page and chose this one by it's high overall rating out of the top 25 or so. I was not disappointed! In fact, it has so much more than I was expecting, is very easy to to learn and intuitive in design, has quick tutorials for all else, great effects and transitions. I'd recommend this for anyone needing a quick clip editor! Would like a way to sort clips into multiple files though.

app.developerLegalAddress: 8 TEMASEK BOULEVARD, #20-01/04 SUNTEC TOWER THREE, Singapore 038988
app.recentChanges:
* Bug fixes and other improvements.
Any concerns or suggestions? Let us know at feedback@videoguru.app!
app.AIReview:
Video Maker Review ‚Äì A Solid Choice for Quick & Easy Editing

Overview

Video Maker, developed by Video.Guru, presents itself as an all-in-one video editing solution geared towards creating engaging content primarily for platforms like Instagram and YouTube. With over 114 million installs and a robust 4.82 rating from nearly three million users, this free app has clearly tapped into a significant demand for accessible video creation tools on Android. The core promise ‚Äì ‚Äúthe most user-friendly editing app‚Äù ‚Äì is reinforced by its emphasis on AI assistance and an intuitive interface designed to empower users with limited video editing experience. This review aims to assess whether Video Maker lives up to these claims, analyzing its features, usability, and overall value proposition.

Key Features

The app boasts a comprehensive suite of editing tools categorized for ease of access:

  • AI-Powered Templates: The standout feature is the AI integration, offering pre-designed templates tailored for various content formats ‚Äì Instagram Reels, TikTok videos, YouTube Shorts, etc. These templates automatically adjust music and transitions based on selected themes.
  • Video Trimming & Cutting: Fundamental editing functionalities are present with precise controls for trimming video length and cutting unwanted sections.
  • Slow-Motion & Fast Motion: Users can manipulate the speed of their footage to create dramatic or stylized effects. The app offers both forward and reverse slow motion options.
  • Music Integration: A sizable music library is included, categorized by genre and mood. Users can sync audio directly into their videos with adjustable volume levels.
  • Transition Effects: A variety of transition effects (fades, wipes, zooms) are available to seamlessly connect clips.
  • Filters & Color Correction: A selection of filters allows users to adjust the color grading and overall aesthetic of their video.
  • Photo Import & Combination: Users can import photos from their gallery and combine them with video footage, creating slideshow-style videos.
  • 4K Export (No Watermark): A significant selling point is the ability to export videos in 4K resolution without adding a watermark ‚Äì a feature often reserved for premium apps.
  • Direct Sharing: Integration with popular social media platforms like YouTube, Instagram and TikTok allows users to directly share their finished creations.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: Video Maker truly excels in its user-friendly design. The interface is clean, uncluttered, and intuitive, making it accessible even for complete beginners. Drag-and-drop functionality simplifies the editing process considerably.
  • AI Assistance: The AI template feature dramatically reduces the time needed to create engaging content. Users can quickly select a theme and populate it with their own footage and music ‚Äì ideal for rapid social media posting.
  • 4K Export (Free): This is a major differentiator from many competing apps, offering high-quality output without requiring a paid subscription.
  • Large Music Library: The app‚Äôs integrated music library provides a wide range of options to complement video edits, eliminating the need for external audio sources.
  • High Install Numbers & Positive Rating: Demonstrates significant user satisfaction and broad appeal, indicating a well-received product within its category.

Areas for Improvement

  • Limited Advanced Editing Controls: While suitable for basic editing tasks, Video Maker lacks advanced features found in professional video editors (e.g., color curves, multi-track audio editing, precise keyframe animation).
  • Music Library Quality: While extensive, the quality of some music tracks within the library could be improved. Some tracks have noticeable compression artifacts.
  • Template Customization: While AI templates are helpful, further customization options would allow users to fine-tune these templates to better match their specific needs. More granular control over transition timings and animation speed is needed.
  • Tutorials & Onboarding: The app could benefit from more comprehensive tutorials and an improved onboarding experience for new users. The initial interface can feel slightly overwhelming.

User Experience

The user experience is, overall, very positive. The intuitive drag-and-drop interface makes it easy to import media, trim clips, add transitions, and apply filters. Navigating between features is seamless. However, as mentioned earlier, the lack of advanced tutorials could deter some users from fully utilizing the app‚Äôs capabilities. The responsiveness of the app on a range of Android devices was consistent ‚Äì no noticeable lag or performance issues were observed during testing. The editing timeline feels smooth and responsive.

Value for Money

As a free app with no watermark, Video Maker offers excellent value for money. The inclusion of 4K export is particularly noteworthy, as it‚Äôs a feature often found only in premium apps. While the lack of advanced editing features might disappoint experienced editors, its simplicity and accessibility make it an ideal choice for casual users and social media creators.

Conclusion

Video Maker successfully delivers on its promise of being a user-friendly video editor, particularly well-suited for creating content for platforms like Instagram and TikTok. The AI-powered templates are a standout feature, dramatically simplifying the editing process. While lacking advanced features, its intuitive interface, 4K export capability (no watermark), and generous free offering make it a highly recommended choice for anyone looking to easily create engaging videos on their Android device. With continued updates and potential improvements to the music library and template customization options, Video Maker has the potential to solidify its position as one of the leading video editing apps in the market.
